trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_000<tab>Yes, yes, this is the Facet of Gathering, but we have our hands full at the moment. If you have a request, you'll have to wait a while.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Qeshi-Rae's esteem for you has grown.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>Deliver the items Qeshi-Rae needs, and deliver them often to learn more about her!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_030<tab>Have you brought me evidence of the samiel from Amh Araeng? Ahhh, the anticipation of finding a lead is so heady, I can scarcely focus on my duties!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_055<tab>Well now, this claw belonged to quite a large beast! I dare to hope it will yield valuable information on the samiel! My thanks!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_100<tab>Among the specimens you've brought back, one in particular stood out─a claw fragment that resembles that of no known creature out there.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_101<tab>This is definitely worth requesting an analysis of the Hortorium. Wait a moment while I fetch one of their researchers.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_102<tab>Allow me to introduce Mao-Ladd. He works closely with Yalana─the poor bastard─and analyzes resources for us.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_103<tab>But most importantly, he is the researcher I mentioned who claims to have encountered the samiel!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_100_103<tab>Go on and recount your tale, lad!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_MAOLADD_000_104<tab>On that day, I traveled to Amh Araeng with a crew of miners in order to survey an excavation site.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_MAOLADD_000_105<tab>We were going about our work when, without warning, a massive shadow fell over us!

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_MAOLADD_000_106<tab>Startled, we looked up to see what it was...only to find empty sky. Whatever was there had vanished. It didn't move away, but <var 1A 02 /var>vanished<var 1A 01 /var>, shadow and all.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_MAOLADD_000_107<tab>That was no cloud or bird. No, it could only be the ghost of the samiel whispered in Mord legend!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_108<tab>Mao, my boy, it ill becomes a man of learning to resort to fanciful tales for an explanation.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_MAOLADD_000_109<tab>B-But...

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_110<tab>Here, take a look at this specimen that <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> recovered. And you'll see that what you encountered was not some ghost of the samiel, but the samiel itself!

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_MAOLADD_000_111<tab>This resembles the claw of a lizard, yet there aren't any species nearly so massive in Amh Araeng. Assuming the creature it came from is a quadruped, we can project its height to be... Ah.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_MAOLADD_000_112<tab>M-May I hold on to this? I'd like to examine this more closely at the Hortorium.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_113<tab>We were about to ask you to do just that! Should you learn anything of interest, be sure to let us know.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_114<tab>And there you have it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. For now we have but to wait.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_115<tab>In the meantime, perhaps you'd like to acquaint yourself with other lands and the resources they hold. I daresay it would be of interest to a visitor such as you.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_116<tab>Feel free to gather as you see fit. You're respectful of nature, I believe, and won't take more than she can give.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_170<tab>Qeshi-Rae is pleased with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Seeker of the Samiel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_130<tab>Ah, there you are, my friend! You'll be pleased to hear that Mao has finished his analysis.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_135<tab>The next request will be available from Qeshi-Rae upon reaching level 73 as a miner or botanist.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_150<tab>As we had first assumed, the peculiar specimen you recovered comes from no beast we're familiar with.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_151<tab>While we don't have conclusive evidence as to the identity of its owner, we're certain that it's a tremendously large creature. A creature not unlike the samiel!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_152<tab>There's just one problem: by the time you found the claw fragment, it had already lain there for several moons.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_153<tab>This means that its owner has likely left Amh Araeng and the trail is cold.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_154<tab>But be not disheartened! We've practically established the samiel's existence, and that is a samiel-sized step in our quest.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_155<tab>Moreover, we have promising new information. It comes from a sentry at the Accensor Gate.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_156<tab>According to the fellow, he was out on patrol a few nights ago when he felt a rhythmic tremor. He rounded up his comrades and they set out to investigate.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_157<tab>And what should they find...but nothing at all. Not even a lone field mouse. There was just an oddly muggy gust of wind. Unnerved by the strangeness of it all, the sentries decided to beat a hasty retreat.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_158<tab><sniff> <sniff> Do you smell that, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? It's the glorious stench of the samiel, right here in Lakeland!

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_159<tab>Time is of the essence if we are to track it down. To that end, I want you to take yourself to Sullen and look for more evidence of the creature. Not any sort of evidence this time, mind you, but its droppings. The fresher, the better.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_100_159<tab>Time is of the essence if we are to track it down. To that end, I want you to take yourself to the Thirstless Shore and look for more evidence of the creature. Not any sort of evidence this time, mind you, but its droppings. The fresher, the better.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_160<tab>I know, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I know, but it's for a good cause. A steaming, fly-ridden pile of excrement is a veritable repository of knowledge. We just need to be willing to go elbow deep to extract it.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_161<tab>So please─<var 1A 02 /var>please<var 1A 01 /var>! Gather as much of the brown, pungent stuff as you can!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_162<tab>I knew I could depend on you! I await your return with bated breath─lest the stench make me queasy!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_171<tab>The Crystarium Deliveries list for Qeshi-Rae has been updated.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_180<tab>There is much to be learned from an animal's droppings, from its identity and diet to its physical condition.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_181<tab>Would that I could do the analyzing myself, but I wouldn't dream of depriving Yalana of the joy of having one's nose in feces. Nor you the joy of looking for it! Off to Sullen you go, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_100_181<tab>Would that I could do the analyzing myself, but I wouldn't dream of depriving Yalana of the joy of having one's nose in feces. Nor you the joy of looking for it! Off to the Thirstless Shore you go, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_201<tab>My, you'll have to go far to find fresher, plumper droppings! Thank you for these beauties, my friend! I shall see them to Yalana's hands while they're still steaming!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_230<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it will sadden you to hear this, but we have no further need of droppings.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_231<tab>Even as we speak, Yalana is compiling the results of her preliminary analysis. Let's pay her a visit, shall we?
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_232<tab>Excellent timing, Chief. I'm ready to present my results.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_233<tab>...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I wasn't expecting you too. Don't tell me the chief has roped you into her obsession?
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_A1_000_001<tab>Yes. Yes, she has.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_A1_000_002<tab>I'm doing this willingly.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_234<tab>Chief! I thought I told you not to make a burden of yourself to other people!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_235<tab>Why, I never... Chief! I hope you've thanked <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> profusely!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_236<tab>Remember, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─you don't have to do this. You can stop whenever you like.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_237<tab>The chief is oblivious to the discomfort of others. You have to make it crystal clear when you've had enough, else oblivious she will remain.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_238<tab>Right, the results.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_239<tab>Through my preliminary analysis of the excrement, I've established that it belongs to no beast we have in our records.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_240<tab>There were traces of the shoots of Lakeland's tallest trees, suggesting that the creature possesses a towering stature.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_241<tab>That is all I have for now, but I will conduct a deeper analysis in order to learn about the creature's behavior.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_242<tab>Well, you're certainly ready and willing─when it comes to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Excuse me if I'm a little jealous.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_243<tab>And you'll excuse me if I'm not wholly fond of those who are wont to make a nuisance of themselves.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_244<tab>Besides, if there's a creature out there that is unknown to us, it's our duty to shed light upon it.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_245<tab>Oho, finally having some fun, are we? I knew you'd come around!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_246<tab>That's not exactly my motivation... At any rate, I'll be in touch again with the detailed results.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_247<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I'm sure the chief will pass the information to you before proceeding to send you off on another errand.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_248<tab>Precisely! Until then, my friend, do keep your gathering skills sharp. We will have need of them!

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_320<tab>Qeshi-Rae is delighted with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Chaser of the Samiel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_260<tab>Ah, you've come at a good time! Even as we speak, Yalana makes her way here with fresh tidings.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_265<tab>The next request will be available from Qeshi-Rae upon reaching level 75 as a miner or botanist.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_300<tab>Apologies for the wait. I've determined more details of the beast we suspect to be the samiel.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_301<tab>A deeper analysis of the droppings revealed that the creature had consumed vegetation found across all of Norvrandt.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_302<tab>This tells us that we are dealing with a migrating herbivore.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_303<tab>Furthermore, it swallows pebbles to aid with digestion and consumes mineral-rich soil.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_304<tab>Of most interest, however, is the fact that said vegetation was largely composed of plants native to Il Mheg.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_305<tab>Amazing work, Yalana! Thanks to you, we now know where to take our search!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_306<tab>But Il Mheg, of all places... That's reckless even by my standards.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_307<tab>You're not familiar with the perils of Il Mheg? It's the home of the fae folk, and a place not even Eulmore dares to tread.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_308<tab>Our miners and botanists are expressly instructed not to wander near lest they be made the faeries' playthings─a fate worse than death, by all accounts.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_309<tab>But wait... Rumor has it you've befriended a pixie. If this is true, perhaps you won't come to harm. Would you be willing to venture into Il Mheg for our noble cause?
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_310<tab>What? Does the name Il Mheg not strike terror into you? Wait, could it be...?
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_311<tab>Rumor has it a dauntless <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> recently set foot into that forbidden land. Could that individual be you?

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_312<tab>Hah, that explains your utter nonchalance at the prospect of facing the fae menace! Would you be willing to venture into Il Mheg once more for our noble cause?

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_313<tab>Wonderful, wonderful! For a moment, I feared that the efforts of the Samiel Search Squad would come to a premature end. But thanks to our brave captain, we may continue our good work!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_314<tab>...The Samiel Search Squad? You made up such a thing?

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_315<tab>Aye! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> is our esteemed captain, while I'm <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> trusty intelligence officer. You and Mao-Ladd are both members, of course...though I can promote you to deputy captain if you prefer?

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_316<tab>So, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. This time, we ask that you venture to an area known as Timh Gyeus in Il Mheg and gather vegetation that the samiel has fed on. I speak of partially chewed plant parts and the like.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_317<tab>Please deliver what you find to the chief. That way, she'll have some actual work to keep her occupied and out of trouble.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_YALANA_000_318<tab>Chief─I expect you to bring me the specimens without delay. Is that clear?
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_321<tab>The Crystarium Deliveries list for Qeshi-Rae has been updated.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_330<tab>The samiel is beginning to transcend legend and take real, physical shape. I can't wait to see what else we'll learn from the plant parts you find in Il Mheg!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_355<tab>Oho, whatever bit into this was ravenous, and my coin is on the samiel! An excellent find, my friend. I'll deliver it to Yalana at once.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_380<tab>Thanks to you, we have all the specimens we need.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_381<tab>Yalana is carrying out her analysis even as we speak. And though she won't admit it, it's plain she's enjoying herself.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_382<tab>And small wonder, for we stand on the cusp of making one of the greatest discoveries the animal kingdom has ever seen!

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_383<tab>Or should that be “never seen”? While we've found ample evidence of the creature's activities, we haven't caught so much as a glimpse of its scaly skin. This in spite of its prodigious size...
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_384<tab>I don't know how to explain it. We must think on it some more.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_450<tab>Qeshi-Rae is overjoyed with your efforts. She now considers you an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Unveiler of the Samiel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_390<tab>A new quest continuing the story of the search for the samiel is now available.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_400<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I was hoping you would come by. I have a favor to ask of you.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_405<tab>The next request will be available from Qeshi-Rae upon reaching level 78 as a miner or botanist.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_430<tab>I've been pondering the recent episode in Il Mheg, where the samiel vanished as suddenly as it appeared.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_431<tab>However it managed to do that─I believe <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> is the key to its elusiveness.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_432<tab>While I have my theories, the little shred of skin you found us isn't enough to draw a decisive conclusion.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_433<tab>To wit, we need more specimens, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! As many as you can find!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_434<tab>So, based on your and Mao-Ladd's accounts, we can confirm that the creature is akin to a lizard, albeit massive.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_435<tab>From this we may assume that it sheds its skin by rubbing off the outer layer a little at a time.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_436<tab>Having accomplished this exhausting task, it then gorges on food to regain its strength.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_437<tab>Combining this assumption with our knowledge that the creature migrates in search of lush vegetation, we can ascertain where we're most likely to find its skin.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_438<tab>That is, in Rak'tika, the lushest forest in Norvrandt! If I were a samiel looking to have a feast, that is where I would take myself.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_439<tab>Capable a captain as you are, even the secluded domain of the Viis ought to pose no obstacle to you.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_440<tab>And this brings us to your next task.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_441<tab>Set forth for Rak'tika, my friend, for the Blind Forest of Yx'Maja, and gather the samiel's skin! Through the skin the creature has shed with, we will shed light on the creature!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_451<tab>The Crystarium Deliveries list for Qeshi-Rae has been updated.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_460<tab>Ah, to behold the samiel with my own eyes... The skin, my friend─you must bring us more shreds of the creature's skin from the Blind Forest of Yx'Maja in Rak'tika!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_485<tab>Blessed night... I asked for shreds of skin, but you've brought me a veritable tapestry! This will tell us many a tale about its owner!

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_500<tab>My thanks for gathering these specimens, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'm pleased to see that the samiel was indeed shedding its skin in Rak'tika.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_501<tab>Now, based on a cursory inspection, Yalana believes that all the specimens probably came from the same creature.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_502<tab>This worries me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. What if this proves to be the last surviving creature?
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_503<tab>Of course, it may be that the beasts are solitary in nature. It may be that Yalana is mistaken.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_504<tab>But it avails us naught to worry about such things at this time. For now, we can but wait for the results of the analysis.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_505<tab>Ahahaha...AHAHAHAHA! Ahhh, truly, the samiel is a mystery among mysteries! I won't rest until I know everything about it!

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_506<tab>Are you with me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? But of course you are! Behind that icy countenance, your heart burns to uncover the truth!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_507<tab>Now, tell me, my inimitable captain─why do you think the samiel is so elusive? No need to overthink it. Say whatever comes to mind.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_A2_000_001<tab>It uses mimicry.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_A2_000_002<tab>It's like a faerie.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_A2_000_003<tab>It can change its size.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_508<tab>Mimicry, you say? That would indeed be an effective way to hide itself from predators, not to mention nosy researchers!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_509<tab>Like a faerie, you say? Indeed, if it could employ glamours as the fae folk do, it'd be an easy thing to stay hidden.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_510<tab>Can change its size, you say? We've assumed that the samiel is a massive beast, but it may behoove us to step back and reconsider that notion.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_511<tab>Thank you, my friend, this gives me much to mull over.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_512<tab>I'll be certain to share your theory with Yalana and her colleagues. You never know─it could well be the spark that illuminates the mystery!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_513<tab>And now that we have so many shreds of skin, surely one can be spared! Yes, just a little taste... Mmmmmm, sacrilicious...
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_514<tab>Oh, fine, then. I won't eat it.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_515<tab>...Yet. It couldn't hurt once Yalana's done with them, right? Speaking of which, I should deliver them to her. Rest assured I'll keep you apprised of any developments.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_516<tab>Mark my words, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, next time we will find the samiel, and it will be glorious! See that you keep your tools honed and your steps spry!

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_517<tab>Qeshi-Rae is thrilled with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Protector of the Samiel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_510<tab>A new quest continuing the story of the search for the samiel is now available. Speak with Qeshi-Rae as a miner or botanist level 80 or above to undertake the quest.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_530<tab>Greetings, my friend! How fare you? Found any rare and interesting specimens lately?

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_531<tab>I'd love nothing more than to be out and about like you, but I'm resigned to behaving myself for a while. It's all fun and games if Yalana alone is annoyed, but Katliss is another matter. Her, you do not want to anger...

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_540<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, how kind of you to visit! The facet continues to do its good work, you'll be pleased to hear. With night restored, we're hopeful that the realm's flora and fauna will thrive as they haven't in a hundred years!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_550<tab>Unable to obtain your reward. Your inventory is full.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_SYSTEM_000_560<tab>In order to make deliveries, you must be a miner or a botanist.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_570<tab>Oho, there you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Tell me, what sorts of rare and fascinating materials did it take to make that splendorous tool of yours?

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_571<tab>The mere concept boggles the mind... Resources from the old world, all melded together into brilliant, beautiful amalgamations of hope! I haven't stopped thinking about it since Chora-Zoi's little survey.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4_00570_QESHIRAE_000_572<tab>Ahhh, what a time to be alive! What wonders shall be revealed once we obtain these tools? What sorts of discoveries might we make? One thing is for certain─exciting days await!
